net.tfobz.vokabeltrainer.model

Class Lernkartei

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tfobz.vokabeltrainer.model.Lernkartei

  • public class Lernkartei
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a learning card in a vocabulary trainer application. A learning card contains a description and descriptions of two associated words. It also manages settings such as learning direction and case sensitivity.

    This class provides functionalities to validate input data and track validation errors.

    Example usage:

         Lernkartei card = new Lernkartei("Basic Greetings", "Hello", "Hallo", true, false);
     card.validate();
     if (card.getFehler() != null) {
         // Handle validation errors
     }

                  boolean richtung,
                  boolean grossKleinschreibung)
        Constructs a Lernkartei with all fields specified.
        Parameters:
        nummer - The unique number of the learning card.
        beschreibung - The description of the learning card.
        wortEinsBeschreibung - The description of the first word.
        wortZweiBeschreibung - The description of the second word.
        richtung - The direction of learning (true for one direction, false for both).
        grossKleinschreibung - Whether case sensitivity is enabled.
